title: Property deduplication to eliminate 50% bloat in HTTP Request and similar nodes

implementation.approach: Implemented _deduplicate_properties() method that deduplicates by (name, displayOptions) key while preserving intentional duplicates with different visibility conditions. Prefers properties with _source field for better tracking.

test_results.notes: Tested with HTTP Request (64→32 props, 50% bloat removed). Verified intentional duplicates preserved (body, bodyParameters, specifyBody with different displayOptions).
